::DarkMouse::
She looked up at Black Aracnia.  She shook and shivered as she was 
still in a cold sweat.  Beads of sweat formed on her forehead.  She 
clentched her hand into fist. It felt good to be able to move a part 
of her body at will. She wispered to Black Aracnia,"Please, I'm cold."
She wasn't sure if the shaking was from the fact that she was cold or 
her body coming back to life. She knew she had died and had been 
brought back, but more and more of the encounter she had was fading 
fast from her mind.  She closed her eyes and hoped the shaking would 
stop soon.  She reopened her eyes and looked at Black Aracnia, "I'm 
sorry." she whispered. "I'm sorry."
